description.name: User can log in with valid username/password-combination

scenario.name: user can login with correct password

when.name: a valid username and password are entered

then.name: user will be logged in to system

scenario.name: user can not login with incorrect password

when.name: a valid username and incorrect password are entered

then.name: user will not be logged in to system

scenario.name: nonexistent user can not login to

when.name: a nonexistent username and some password are entered

then.name: user will not be logged in to system

description.name: A new user account can be created if a proper unused username and a proper password are given

scenario.name: creation succesfull with correct username and password

when.name: a valid username and password are entered

then.name: new user is registered to system

scenario.name: can login with succesfully generated account

when.name: a valid username and password are entered

then.name: new credentials allow logging in to system

scenario.name: creation fails with correct username and too short password

when.name: a valid username and too short password are entered

then.name: new user is not be registered to system

scenario.name: creation fails with correct username and pasword consisting of letters

when.name: a valid username and password consisting of letters are entered

then.name: new user is not be registered to system

scenario.name: creation fails with too short username and valid pasword

when.name: a too sort username and valid password are entered

then.name: new user is not be registered to system

scenario.name: creation fails with already taken username and valid pasword

when.name: a already taken username and valid password are entered

then.name: new user is not be registered to system

scenario.name: can not login with account that is not succesfully created

then.name: new credentials do not allow logging in to system
